org.eclipse.graphiti.mm.algorithms.styles

Interface Style

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractStyle, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, StyleContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StyleImpl

    public interface Style
extends StyleContainer, AbstractStyle
    A representation of the model object ' Style'.
    See Also:
    StylesPackage.getStyle()

      • getRotation

        java.lang.Double getRotation()
